title: YAY!! its my 1000th problem this month on EUNE :)
body:
like ok this is just getting out of control, we already had it all, from the sever being down for 4 days for the majority of players, to the disabling ranked queues duo to "technical issues" 8 times a week. and now this, i cant connect to the game whenever i click on the client i get this :
"could not connect to HTTP server. please check that your internet ..." i already tried 5 suggested solutions and nothing worked.
im just sick of wasting every time hours upon hours in trying to fix these problems.
i think its time to start caring about EUNE again :D

replies.body:
It sounds like your client isn't able to establish a stable connection to the server. There are certainly a lot of potential causes for this, but our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a great place to start in resolving this for good. 

Let me know if you see any changes after working through that guide.
